participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, with a passion for music and community service.
participant_1.background: i enjoy exploring new parts of the city. i play several instruments. i'm a piano teacher on the side. my father played violin professionally. i volunteer at the homeless shelter.

participant_2.name: Carlos
participant_2.personality: Enthusiastic and adventurous, with a strong connection to culinary traditions.
participant_2.background: i'm a descendant of christopher columbus. i love to cook paella. i've a weakness for fish and chips. i visit europe twice a year. i am an art major in college.
